meta.description: Azure Media Services is a cloud platform service for live streaming, encoding, and content protection that allows you to build fast, reliable video experiences. Azure Media Services manages every step of your video experience, from ingestion and transcoding to packaging and delivery, using the same technology that powers Teams live events and LinkedIn Live. View samples, quick starts, demos, and live low-latency HLS and DASH streaming, and quickly build out your own unique video solutions with our SDKs.

landing.title: Azure Media Services
landing.valueProp: See it in action with up to 5 hours of free live streaming.

sections.description: Azure Media Services manages every step of your video experience, from ingestion and transcoding to packaging and delivery, using the same technology that powers Teams live events and LinkedIn Live.
Whether it's a dozen to millions of streams, you can rest assured your viewers will always watch with less buffering and watch your live streams near-realtime.
Trusted by governments and companies around the world, we offer secure video streaming with digital rights management, geo-blocking, URL signing, and more.
Get automatic real-time transcription in 50+ languages without sacrificing quality or speed.

Seamless integration with Azure Video Indexer to extract deep insights from your videos. Power new forms of content discovery such as searching for spoken words, faces, characters, and more. Enrich your apps with embedded video insights to drive user engagement.
sections.callToAction: Learn more about Azure Video Indexer

liveDemo.title: Try low latency live streaming
liveDemo.playerNotes: Current player is Shaka player version {{playerVersion}}. The burned-in timecode is generated during encoding using system clock time.
liveDemo.clockNotes: Be sure to sync your local system clock before evaluating end-to-end latency. Latency charts are not available on iOS at this time.
liveDemo.onDemandMessage: The live low-latency (LL-HLS) stream demo is currently offline for maintenance. The current playback is not a live stream. Please check back at a later time.
liveDemo.callToAction: You can get details on how to get started with low latency live (LL-HLS) streaming in our documentation.

features.title: Customizable features for all your video needs

list.item: Low latency between 4-7 seconds at scale
Fallback to standard HLS for legacy clients
No proprietary player. Works in Shaka, Dash.js, HLS.js, Video.js, ExoPlayer and Apple AVPlayer.
Full HD 1080p 30fps with adaptive bitrates at low-latency
Low-latency automatic captions and subtitles available in 50+ languages
Time-shift (DVR) window support up to 6 hours
Simple live-to-VOD transition from the same URLs cached to the CDN
Choose your own CDN, or use the integrated Azure CDN
Monitor your events with Event Grid and Azure Monitor

industry.title: Fitness
industry.headline: Stay fit together
industry.body: Connect your athletes to one another. Deliver classes from a few hundred viewers to thousands in an instant. Build a library of on-demand classes for your subscribers and protect the content with digital rights management.

industry.title: Enterprise
industry.headline: Build a global workforce
industry.body: Let your teams work together wherever they are with high-scale live events and town halls.

industry.title: Live shopping
industry.headline: Bring the in-store experience home
industry.body: Reach your retail audience with live streams to build brand loyalty and drive sales.

industry.title: Government
industry.headline: Connect with your community
industry.body: Foster communication between government officials and the public with live legislative sessions, virtual town halls, and more.

industry.title: Education
industry.headline: Elevate online education
industry.body: Create high-quality, interactive learning experiences that bring the virtual classroom to life.

industry.title: Energy
industry.headline: Deliver a clean energy future
industry.body: Cut your carbon footprint and minimize travel with virtual or hybrid events.

industry.title: Healthcare
industry.headline: Reach patients where they are
industry.body: Educate patients on common illnesses and prevention methods with health webinars or on demand videos

industry.title: Manufacturing
industry.headline: Boost production quality
industry.body: Capture drone or robot footage at every step in your operation to identify gaps, reduce costs, and improve your products.

features.title: Fully customizable features for all your video needs

items.title: Stream from any encoder
items.description: Supports RTMP/RTMPS ingest for live streaming from many encoders.

items.title: Stream to any client
items.description: HLS and DASH outputs can reach all devices.

items.title: Seamless live to VOD
items.description: Instant live to VOD without changing your playback URL. Reuse content in the same CDN cache as your live event.

items.title: Clipping and highlights
items.description: Instantly generate highlights using dynamic manifest filters without modifying the original archive, or export MP4 clips.

items.title: Monitor, notify and react
items.description: Media Services live events integrate with Azure Monitor and Event Grid to detect issues early.

items.title: Live captions
items.description: Reach your audience with real-time transcription in 50+ languages without sacrificing latency.

items.title: Dynamic content encryption
items.description: Secure your live content with AES-128, or Microsoft PlayReady, Apple FairPlay and Google Widevine DRM protections.

items.title: Choose your input
items.description: We support most input video formats, including professional-grade: H.264, H.265, and Apple ProRes.

items.title: All presets
items.description: Choose from dozens of commonly-used encoding presets, or create custom presets.

items.title: Dynamic Packaging
items.description: Deliver adaptive-bitrate content in HLS and MPEG-DASH streaming protocol formats using our built-in packaging capabilities.

items.title: Subtitles and closed captions
items.description: Get automatic speech-to-text transcriptions and subtitles in 50+ languages.

items.title: Content Protection
items.description: Encrypt your encoded content with AES-128 or any of the major DRM systems: Microsoft PlayReady, Apple FairPlay, or Google Widevine.

items.title: Content-aware encoding
items.description: Our presets are built to optimize bitrate and resolution for the best streaming and storage cost.

items.title: Automatic scaling without reservation
items.description: Submit encoding jobs across multiple regions without the fear of limitâ€”encoding automatically scales to meet your needs.

items.title: Static package and deliver from anywhere
items.description: Encode and output your content as static HLS or DASH files for streaming direct from any HTTP/S cloud storage or web server.

items.title: Encode with us, or upload your content
items.description: Use our content-aware encoding preset for the best results, or upload your own MP4 content to stream instantly.

items.title: HLS and DASH from the same stored MP4s
items.description: Save storage costs by storing a single set of MP4s and use dynamic manifest to deliver both HLS and DASH from a single set of MP4 files.

items.title: Subtitles and Closed Captions
items.description: Add subtitles from WebVTT files, or use the built-in transcription presets to generate subtitle files using speech-to-text technology.

items.title: Add descriptive audio tracks
items.description: Enhance accessibility by adding descriptive audio tracks or additional language tracks to your streams.

items.title: Instant highlights and clipping
items.description: Clip any video to the length you want using simple filters when publishing.

items.title: Enhance your streams as you grow
items.description: Add additional subtitle tracks at any time to existing videos.

items.title: Client SDKs and samples
items.description: Get started quickly with client SDKs and samples available for .NET, Node.js/Javascript, Python, Java, Go.

items.title: Azure portal account management
items.description: Manage features, integrations, security, and monitoring all in one place.

items.title: Private network management
items.description: Turn on private link support to securely access your Media Services accounts on your own private network.

items.title: Role-based access control
items.description: Restrict access to critical resources in your accounts.

items.title: Bring your own keys
items.description: Bring your own content keys for protected streaming, account encryption, and storage account access

items.title: Get trusted storage with Managed Identities
items.description: Allow access to storage accounts protected by firewalls by turning on Managed Identities.

items.title: Encrypt all of your assets at rest
items.description: Use the default storage side encryption to encrypt all of your assets at rest, or bring your own key to control the encryption.

items.title: Fine-grained security using Azure Policy
items.description: Get built-in fine-grained security, restrict outbound internet streaming, and limit content delivery to only your private network.

freeLive.title: Get up to 5 hours of free live streaming.

tryFree.title: Try Azure Media Services for free
tryFree.description: Get up to 5 hours of live streaming.

customers.title: Customers
customers.subHeader: Trusted by the world's most ambitious streaming teams.
